definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: press down and out (Aram. [[זִיר]] press together, Syr. zwar, zor compress; cf. Ar. zay=ara twist the lip of a beast)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[זׁ֫רוּ]] Is 1:6 (pass.; > √[[זרר]], Ar. zar=a draw forcibly together Ol:§ 233 c, 245 l Kö:i. 333); Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיׇּ֫זַר]] Ju Jdg 6:38, 3 fs. sf. [[תְּזוּרֶהָ]] Job 39:15; Pt. pass f. [[זוּרֶה]] ( = [[זוּרָה]] Ges:§ 80, 2, d) Is 59:5; —press (twist or wring) out a fleece Ju Jdg 6:38; not pressed out, of sore (fig. of continued disaster) Is 1:6; press under foot an egg, Job 39:15 (‖[[דּוּשׁ]]), Is 59:5 (pass.)
